original_text: And the one who escapes from the sword of Hazael shall Jehu put to death, and the one who escapes from the sword of Jehu shall Elisha put to death.
korean_text: 하사엘의 칼을 피하는 자를 예후가 죽일 것이요 예후의 칼을 피하는 자를 엘리사가 죽이리라

sentences.original_text: And the one who escapes from the sword of Hazael
and the one who escapes from the sword of Jehu
